qas.question: What were put in place to prevent the mix of races?

When were the laws against marriage between Asians and Europeans lifted?

qas.question: Did these laws change behavior of white slaveholders and other powerful white men?

answers.text: this did not prevent white slaveholders, their sons, or other powerful white men from taking slave women as concubines

answers.text: In California and the western US,

qas.question: Were there any laws against marriage between whites and Asians in the US?

answers.text: White legislators passed laws prohibiting marriage between European and Asian Americans until the 1950s.
